verses.verse: הִֽתְקוֹשְׁשׁ֖וּ <WH7197> Gather yourselves together וָק֑וֹשּׁוּ <WH7197> yea gather together הַגּ֖וֹי <WH1471> O nation לֹ֥א <WH3808> without נִכְסָֽף׃ <WH3700> not desired

בְּטֶ֙רֶם֙ <WH2962> Before לֶ֣דֶת <WH3205> bring forth חֹ֔ק <WH2706> Before the decree כְּמֹ֖ץ <WH4671> as the chaff עָ֣בַר <WH5674> pass י֑וֹם <WH3117> [before] the day בְּטֶ֣רֶם ׀ <WH2962> Before לֹא־ <WH3808> before יָב֣וֹא <WH935> come עֲלֵיכֶ֗ם <WH5921> and חֲרוֹן֙ <WH2740> the fierce אַף־ <WH639> anger יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּטֶ֙רֶם֙ <WH2962> Before לֹא־ <WH3808> not יָב֣וֹא <WH935> come עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5921> and י֖וֹם <WH3117> upon you before the day אַף־ <WH639> anger יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD'S

בַּקְּשׁ֤וּ <WH1245> Seek אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> ye the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> All עַנְוֵ֣י <WH6035> all ye meek הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> Who מִשְׁפָּט֖וֹ <WH4941> his judgment פָּעָ֑לוּ <WH6466> which have wrought בַּקְּשׁוּ־ <WH1245> seek צֶ֙דֶק֙ <WH6664> righteousness בַּקְּשׁ֣וּ <WH1245> seek עֲנָוָ֔ה <WH6038> meekness אוּלַי֙ <WH194> it may be תִּסָּ֣תְר֔וּ <WH5641> ye shall be hid בְּי֖וֹם <WH3117> in the day אַף־ <WH639> anger יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD'S

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For עַזָּה֙ <WH5804> For Gaza עֲזוּבָ֣ה <WH5800> shall be forsaken תִֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> become וְאַשְׁקְל֖וֹן <WH831> and Ashkelon לִשְׁמָמָ֑ה <WH8077> a desolation אַשְׁדּ֗וֹד <WH795> Ashdod בַּֽצָּהֳרַ֙יִם֙ <WH6672> at the noon day יְגָ֣רְשׁ֔וּהָ <WH1644> they shall drive out וְעֶקְר֖וֹן <WH6138> and Ekron תֵּעָקֵֽר׃ <WH6131> shall be rooted up ס

ה֗וֹי <WH1945> Woe יֹֽשְׁבֵ֛י <WH3427> unto the inhabitants חֶ֥בֶל <WH2256> coast הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> of the sea גּ֣וֹי <WH1471> the nation כְּרֵתִ֑ים <WH3774> of the Cherethites דְּבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֗ם <WH5921> is against כְּנַ֙עַן֙ <WH3667> [is] against you O Canaan אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> the land פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וְהַאֲבַדְתִּ֖יךְ <WH6> I will even destroy מֵאֵ֥ין <WH369> there יוֹשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> thee that there shall be no inhabitant

וְֽהָיְתָ֞ה <WH1961> become חֶ֣בֶל <WH2256> coast הַיָּ֗ם <WH3220> And the sea נְוֹ֛ת <WH5116> shall be dwellings כְּרֹ֥ת <WH3741> [and] cottages רֹעִ֖ים <WH7462> for shepherds וְגִדְר֥וֹת <WH1448> and folds צֹֽאן׃ <WH6629> for flocks

וְהָ֣יָה <WH1961> become חֶ֗בֶל <WH2256> And the coast לִשְׁאֵרִ֛ית <WH7611> shall be for the remnant בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> of the house יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5921> and יִרְע֑וּן <WH7462> they shall feed בְּבָתֵּ֣י <WH1004> thereupon in the houses אַשְׁקְל֗וֹן <WH831> of Ashkelon בָּעֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH6153> in the evening יִרְבָּצ֔וּן <WH7257> shall they lie down כִּ֧י <WH3588> for יִפְקְדֵ֛ם <WH6485> shall visit יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> for the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֖ם <WH430> their God וְשָׁ֥ב <WH7725> them and turn away [שְׁבוּתָם כ] (שְׁבִיתָֽם׃ <WH7622> captive ק)

שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH8085> I have heard חֶרְפַּ֣ת <WH2781> the reproach מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab וְגִדּוּפֵ֖י <WH1421> and the revilings בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children עַמּ֑וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which חֵֽרְפוּ֙ <WH2778> whereby they have reproached אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> my people וַיַּגְדִּ֖ילוּ <WH1431> and magnified עַל־ <WH5921> against גְּבוּלָֽם׃ <WH1366> [themselves] against their border

לָכֵ֣ן <WH3651> Therefore חַי־ <WH2416> Therefore [as] I live אָ֡נִי <WH589> I נְאֻם֩ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֜וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Surely מוֹאָ֞ב <WH4124> Surely Moab כִּסְדֹ֤ם <WH5467> shall be as Sodom תִּֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> become וּבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> and the children עַמּוֹן֙ <WH5983> of Ammon כַּֽעֲמֹרָ֔ה <WH6017> as Gomorrah מִמְשַׁ֥ק <WH4476> [even] the breeding חָר֛וּל <WH2738> of nettles וּמִכְרֵה־ <WH953> cistern מֶ֥לַח <WH4417> and salt וּשְׁמָמָ֖ה <WH8077> desolation עַד־ <WH5704> and a עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> perpetual שְׁאֵרִ֤ית <WH7611> the residue עַמִּי֙ <WH5971> of my people יְבָזּ֔וּם <WH962> shall spoil וְיֶ֥תֶר <WH3499> them and the remnant [גֹּוי כ] (גֹּויִ֖י <WH1471> Gentile ק) יִנְחָלֽוּם׃ <WH5157> shall possess

זֹ֥את <WH2063> likewise לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> in תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> return גְּאוֹנָ֑ם <WH1347> This shall they have for their pride כִּ֤י <WH3588> because חֵֽרְפוּ֙ <WH2778> because they have reproached וַיַּגְדִּ֔לוּ <WH1431> and magnified עַל־ <WH5921> against עַ֖ם <WH5971> [themselves] against the people יְהוָ֥ה <WH3069> God צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts

נוֹרָ֤א <WH3372> [will be] terrible יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> The LORD עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> and כִּ֣י <WH3588> for רָזָ֔ה <WH7329> unto them for he will famish אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> all the gods הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְיִשְׁתַּֽחֲווּ־ <WH7812> and [men] shall worship לוֹ֙ אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> him every one מִמְּקוֹמ֔וֹ <WH4725> from his place כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> and all אִיֵּ֥י <WH339> [even] all the isles הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> of the heathen
גַּם־ <WH1571> also אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> O כּוּשִׁ֔ים <WH3569> Ye Ethiopians חַֽלְלֵ֥י <WH2491> [shall be] slain חַרְבִּ֖י <WH2719> by my sword הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> also ye

וְיֵ֤ט <WH5186> And he will stretch out יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> his hand עַל־ <WH5921> against צָפ֔וֹן <WH6828> against the north וִֽיאַבֵּ֖ד <WH6> and destroy אֶת־ <WH853> אַשּׁ֑וּר <WH804> Assyria וְיָשֵׂ֤ם <WH7760> and will make אֶת־ <WH853> נִֽינְוֵה֙ <WH5210> Nineveh לִשְׁמָמָ֔ה <WH8077> a desolation צִיָּ֖ה <WH6723> [and] dry כַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> like a wilderness

וְרָבְצ֨וּ <WH7257> shall lie down בְתוֹכָ֤הּ <WH8432> in the midst עֲדָרִים֙ <WH5739> And flocks כָּל־ <WH3605> All חַיְתוֹ־ <WH2416> of her all the beasts ג֔וֹי <WH1471> of the nations גַּם־ <WH1571> Both קָאַת֙ <WH6893> both the cormorant גַּם־ <WH1571> Both קִפֹּ֔ד <WH7090> and the bittern בְּכַפְתֹּרֶ֖יהָ <WH3730> in the upper lintels יָלִ֑ינוּ <WH3885> shall lodge ק֠וֹל <WH6963> of it [their] voice יְשׁוֹרֵ֤ר <WH7891> shall sing בַּֽחַלּוֹן֙ <WH2474> in the windows חֹ֣רֶב <WH2721> desolation בַּסַּ֔ף <WH5592> [shall be] in the thresholds כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אַרְזָ֖ה <WH731> the cedar work עֵרָֽה׃ <WH6168> for he shall uncover

זֹ֞א֠ת <WH2063> likewise הָעִ֤יר <WH5892> city הָעַלִּיזָה֙ <WH5947> This [is] the rejoicing הַיּוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> that dwelt לָבֶ֔טַח <WH983> carelessly הָאֹֽמְרָה֙ <WH559> that said בִּלְבָבָ֔הּ <WH3824> in her heart אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am וְאַפְסִ֣י <WH657> I [am] and [there is] none beside ע֑וֹד <WH5750> besides אֵ֣יךְ ׀ <WH349> How הָיְתָ֣ה <WH1961> has become לְשַׁמָּ֗ה <WH8047> me how is she become a desolation מַרְבֵּץ֙ <WH4769> to lie down in לַֽחַיָּ֔ה <WH2416> a place for beasts כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> Everyone עוֹבֵ֣ר <WH5674> every one that passeth by עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> by יִשְׁרֹ֖ק <WH8319> her shall hiss יָנִ֥יעַ <WH5128> [and] wag יָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> his hand ס
